question: Can we read salaah or read the quraan or do we have to make wudhu after having a bath. Are we considered to have wudhu after having a bath.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is Mustahabb (desirable) to make Wudhu before taking a bath. Wudhu should
not be made after taking a bath. A person will be considered being in the
state of Wudhu until his Wudhu breaks.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
